snippet.title: Balatro - Friends of Jimbo (Pack 4) | Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Balatro is now available on Xbox Game Pass!

Add some visual flair to your decks with these new cosmetic card skins inspired by fan-favourite characters like Vault Boy, Ezio Auditore da Firenze, Percival Fredrickstein von Musel Klossowski de Rolo III and more! This update is now available free of charge on PC, Consoles & Mobile

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2379780/Balatro/
Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/balatro-switch/
PlayStation: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10010334
Xbox: https://www.xbox.com/en-US/games/store/balatro/9PK087LNGJC5
Apple Arcade: https://tinyurl.com/mrxvbcmu
Apple App Store: https://tinyurl.com/3ek4bwem
Google Play Store: https://tinyurl.com/vtkzj64s
